mapper.select: /* selectProductRelationList */ SELECT A.INFO_SN_REL AS INFO_SN , B.INFO_TITLE , C.CATEGORY_SN , C.CATEGORY_NM FROM TB_PRODUCT_RELATION A INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT_INFO B ON (B.INFO_SN = A.INFO_SN_REL) INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY C ON (C.CATEGORY_SN = B.CATEGORY_SN) WHERE B.USE_STATE = 'Y' AND B.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.INFO_SN_ORG = #{info_sn_org} ORDER BY C.SORT_NO ASC, B.SORT_NO ASC
